identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a distraction-free, premium productivity tool that feels like a personal executive assistant, not a generic SaaS.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Design precision with Luxury Hotel warmth.
Emotion First: The app should feel 'calm' and 'in control'.
Content is King: The 'Task' is the hero. Everything else is supporting cast.
Negative Space: Aggressive whitespace to reduce cognitive load.
Contrast: High contrast for readability, subtle contrast for hierarchy.

typography.instructions: Use 'Outfit' for all headings to give a modern, premium feel. Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body text for maximum legibility. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for time displays (timer) and data points.

primary.name: Royal Violet
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, brand moments.

secondary.name: Executive Gold
secondary.usage: AI highlights, priority flags, timer progress.

background.usage: Main app background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF in light mode, use #FAFAFA for softness.

text.usage: High contrast for content, lower contrast for metadata.

colors.theme_strategy: Light mode is the default 'Day Focus' modeâ€”clean, crisp, airy. Dark mode is 'Night Owl' modeâ€”deep indigo backgrounds with glowing gold accents.
colors.gradients: Use subtle gradients only for the 'AI Brain' or 'Focus Mode' active state. Example: 'bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-600 to-indigo-600'.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grid items.

structure.dashboard: 3-column layout. Left: Nav/Stats (Narrow). Center: Focus Task/List (Wide). Right: Calendar/Context (Medium).
structure.mobile: Single column stack. Navigation moves to bottom bar or hamburger.

layout.containers: Rounded-xl or Rounded-2xl. No sharp edges. Soft shadows 'shadow-sm' or 'shadow-md'.

buttons.primary: bg-violet-600 hover:bg-violet-700 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium shadow-lg shadow-violet-500/20 transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-violet-900 border border-violet-100 hover:bg-violet-50 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground hover:bg-muted/50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/40 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-violet-500 rounded-none px-0 py-4 text-lg focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

timer.style: Circular progress or large minimalist digital display. Font: JetBrains Mono. Color: Amber-500 (Gold) when active.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-950/80 for sticky headers and floating controls.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, colored shadows. 'shadow-[0_8px_30px_rgb(124,58,237,0.12)]' for primary elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: Subtle. 'border-violet-100' in light mode. 'border-white/10' in dark mode.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Stroke width: 1.5px (Thin/Elegant). Color: Muted foreground by default, Violet/Gold for active.

motion.transitions: All interactive elements must have 'transition-all duration-200 ease-out'.
motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly on click ('active:scale-95'). Tasks slide in from bottom on load.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with a shimmering violet undertone.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is legible. Gold text on white background is trickyâ€”use a darker gold/amber (#B45309) for text, lighter for graphics.

assets.images: No photos. Use abstract geometric shapes or 3D minimalist renders if absolutely necessary for empty states. Prefer CSS-only patterns.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENTATION: Start by setting up the global CSS variables for the Violet/Gold theme in 'index.css'.
2. LAYOUT: Build the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard immediately.
3. COMPONENTS: Customize the Shadcn 'Card' and 'Button' to match the 'Rounded-xl' and 'Violet/Gold' aesthetic.
4. AI INTEGRATION: When the AI 'thinks', show a subtle pulsing gold glow around the task container.
5. TIMER: The Pomodoro timer should be a focal point but not distracting. Use a thin, elegant circle progress.
6. DO NOT use standard 'blue' links or buttons. Everything must be Violet, Gold, or Neutral.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, task items).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no 'robot' emojis.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
